London, Egypt Exploration Society, 2010, 8°, xii-164 pp. et 12 pll. ISBN 978-0-85698-196-8. £65.
P. Oxy. LXXV, 5020-5071. - I. Theological Texts (5020-5024). - II. New Literary Texts (5025-5026). - III. Known Literary Texts (5027-5048). - IV. Documentary Texts (5049-5071).
